Equilibrium
===========

``Equilibrium`` defines a global 2D Tokamak equilibrium, and has the following data:

.. image:: figures/equilibrium.png
  :width: 600

This can be used to load a ``LocalGeometry`` class at a given :math:`\psi_n`.
